sourcesContent:
<template>
    <el-form ref="infoForm" :rules="rules" :model="infoDetail" label-width="100px">
        <el-form-item label="学号" prop="sId">
            <el-input v-model="infoDetail.sId"></el-input>
        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item label="学生姓名" prop="sName">
            <el-input v-model="infoDetail.sName"></el-input>
        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item label="性别" prop="gender">
            <el-select v-model="infoDetail.gender" placeholder="请选择性别">
                <el-option default label="男" :value="1">
                </el-option>
                <el-option default label="女" :value="2">
                </el-option>
            </el-select>
        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item label="密码" prop="password">
            <el-input v-model="infoDetail.password"></el-input>
        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item label="毕业年份" prop="graduationYear">
            <el-input v-model="infoDetail.graduationYear"></el-input>
        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item label="学院" prop="college">
            <el-input v-model="infoDetail.college"></el-input>
        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item label="专业" prop="major">
            <el-input v-model="infoDetail.major"></el-input>
        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item label="手机号" prop="phone">
            <el-input v-model="infoDetail.phone"></el-input>
        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item label="邮箱" prop="email">
            <el-input v-model="infoDetail.email"></el-input>
        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item label="课题名称" v-if="formType === '1'">
            <el-input disabled v-model="infoDetail.topicName"></el-input>
        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item>

        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item>
            <el-button plain type="primary" class="info_btns" v-if="formType === '0'">新增</el-button>

            <el-button plain type="primary" class="info_btns" v-else @click="submitForm('infoForm')">提交修改</el-button>
            <el-button plain type="danger" class="info_btns">取消</el-button>
        </el-form-item>
    </el-form>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    name: "FormStuInfo",
    props: ["formType", "sId"],
    data() {
        return {
            infoDetail: {
                sId: '',
                sName: "",
                gender: "",
                password: "",
                graduationYear: "",
                college: "",
                major: "",
                phone: "",
                email: "",
                topicName: ''
            },
            rules: {
                sId: [
                    { required: true, message: '学号不能为空', trigger: 'blur' },
                ],
                sName: [
                    { required: true, message: '学生姓名不能为空', trigger: 'blur' },
                ],
                gender: [
                    { required: true, message: '请选择学生性别', trigger: 'change' },
                ],
                password: [
                    { required: true, message: '密码不能为空', trigger: 'blur' },
                ],
                graduationYear: [
                    { required: true, message: '毕业年份不能为空', trigger: 'blur' },
                ],
                college: [
                    { required: true, message: '请选择学院', trigger: 'change' },
                ],
                major: [
                    { required: true, message: '请选择专业名称', trigger: 'change' },
                ],
                phone: [
                    { required: true, message: '请输入手机号', trigger: 'blur' },
                    { length: 11, message: '手机号长度为11位', trigger: 'blur' }
                ],
                email: [
                    { required: true, message: '请输入邮箱账号', trigger: 'blur' },
                ],

            }
        }
    },
    methods: {
        submitForm(formName) {
            this.$refs[formName].validate((valid) => {
                if (valid) {
                    alert('submit!');
                    // 发送请求
                } else {
                    console.log('error submit!!');
                    return false;
                }
            });
        }
    }
}
</script>
<style scoped lang="less">
.info_btns {
    margin-right: 50px;
}
</style>
